about.description1_p1: is a major aviation exhibition organized by the Malagasy Air Force, taking place on May 31 and June 1, 2025, at the Ivato Helicopter Squadron. This event is part of the celebration of the 65th anniversary of the Malagasy Armed Forces and aims to showcase the world of aviation in Madagascar. It brings together the public with aerial demonstrations, military and civilian exhibitions, career presentations, innovative technologies, and exchanges with professionals in the sector.
about.description1_p2: Open to all, Aero-Expo 2025 is much more than just an exhibition: it is a moment of discovery, national pride, and the awakening of vocations, where Malagasy aeronautical excellence and know-how are honored.
about.description2_p1: Showcase the achievements of the Air Force and civil aviation, as well as their key role in national defense, economic development, and air transport.
about.description2_p2: Attract foreign partners and strengthen ties with other air forces and civilian institutions around the world.
about.description2_t3: Raise awareness and inspire the general public:
about.description2_p3: Introduce aeronautical careers, spark vocations, and arouse the curiosity of younger generations.
about.description2_p4: Stimulate the hospitality, transport, and service sectors through the expected national and international attendance.

activities.title: What to expect ?
activities.description1: Discover a wide range of aircraft on display, including planes, helicopters, and drones, both military and civilian.
activities.description2: Enjoy a once-in-a-lifetime experience aboard an airplane or helicopter and see the world from above.
activities.description3: Take the leap with a professional in a thrilling tandem parachute jump ‚Äî adrenaline guaranteed!
activities.description4: Be amazed by high-energy aerial demonstrations performed by the elite pilots of the Malagasy Air Force.
activities.description5: Visit booths featuring training centers, airlines, aviation companies, tourism operators, and economic development partners.
activities.description6: Enjoy live music, traditional performances, and entertainment throughout the event.
activities.description7: Attend insightful talks and panels led by industry experts and aviation professionals.
activities.description8: Exchange with experienced aviators and military personnel to learn about their careers and missions.
activities.description9: Witness cutting-edge drone technology in action through interactive demos and flight showcases.
activities.description10: A fun and safe area full of games and activities designed just for children.
